name: Flavortron: The Final Dine and Dash
name_original: Flavortron: The Final Dine and Dash
description: Gal Fieri has eaten some really strange food. Now she awakes on the planet Flavortron, with little idea of how to get home. Can she reunite with her lover Gordina Ramsay, and create the best sandwiches possible for her along the way?
